verbs.description: [ARG0: First Lady Melania Trump] [V: gave] [ARG1: a speech] [ARGM-LOC: at Ford ’s Theatre] [ARGM-TMP: this weekend] , [C-ARG1: one of her first appearances since her 25-day absence following kidney surgery] .
